attributes.action: Put pressure on Motor Scooter manufacturers to reduce the noise made by their products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the increase in the numbers of motor scooters and the tendency of young men to ride around in packs, aimlessly or racing, through residential areas, it is time to reduce the 'noise pollution' made by these machines. Their noise is disproportionate to their size and velocity. With so much said about pollution these days lets not forget about "Noise Pollution".
